text: Location of Helton Township in Ashe County, N.C. Helton Township is one of nineteen townships in Ashe County, North Carolina, United States. The township had a population of 718 as of the 2010 census. Helton Township occupies in northern Ashe County. The township's northern border is with the state of Virginia. There are no incorporated municipalities within Helton Township, but there are several unincorporated communities, including Helton and Sturgills. ==References== Category:Townships in Ashe County, North Carolina Category:Townships in North Carolina
title: Helton Township, Ashe County, North Carolina
